title: Marude Dameo
synopsis: The series stars an elementary school boy named Dameo Marude, who has little success with anything he tries, and a robot named Borot, which is good with housekeeping.
staff: [['Shigino, Akira', ['Director']], ['Shinbou, Akiyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Ueda, Shigeru', ['Episode Director']], ['Urasawa, Yoshio', ['Script', ' Series Composition']]]
